rooms.description: This is the main entrance area with a small coat rack and space for shoes.
The Living Room features high ceilings and large windows to capture as much natural light as possible. It also includes an Art Deco inspired fireplace with a seating area adjacent to it.
rooms.vastu_conformity: East-facing, ensuring the morning sun enters the space.

rooms.description: A semi-open kitchen, seamlessly connected to the living room with a bar counter for casual dining. The design includes modern appliances and ample storage.
rooms.vastu_conformity: South-facing, avoiding direct entry from the main door to prevent noise.

rooms.description: A cozy nook with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, a desk for reading or work, and a comfortable armchair. This space also doubles as an office.
A separate living and sleeping area for the servant(s) with a small bathroom. The quarters are discreetly located away from the main living areas, maintaining privacy.
rooms.vastu_conformity: North-facing to maintain dignity and respect.

rooms.description: A private toilet accessible for guests. It is located in a corner of the ground floor, ensuring privacy and avoiding direct entry from any main living spaces.

openings.description: A wide door that seamlessly connects the entrance hall with the living room, enhancing the flow of space and light.
Large double-glazed windows on all three sides to ensure maximum natural light and ventilation. Windows are designed to block direct sunlight during summer hours for energy efficiency.
A service opening that allows access from the kitchen to the entrance hall for easy movement of supplies and cleaning staff without disturbing the main living spaces.
